descriptionHTML:
Original Watch Face for Android Wear.

Fragment unhurried rural life on the screen of your watch. Rotating blades of the windmill, slowly floating clouds reflects on the water surface pond!

The background changes depend on the time of day!

Watch Face features:
★ There is a windmill;
★ Night mode
★ Clouds
★ Stars;
